title: My case is with the Google support India it's been around a month the issue are coming and the case
content:
My case is with the Google support India it's been around a month the issue are coming and the case  the first ticket the device was declared as No fault found. IT IS very usual service expectation in India the pixel service is not at all good .
I request a senior call back they told they will contact you between 5-7 pm it's been around 48 hours not a dam shit has called me

For detail please revert back .
See the device overheat it's 51 degree Celsius
It's also freezes and no response from the device
